name: Lobot
Lore: 'Son of a traveling slaver. Helps run Cloud City with Administrator Lando Calrissian. Speech capability worn away by constant cyborg neural connection.',
Text: 'Deploys only on Cloud City. Power +2 when present at a Scomp Link. If present at a site, can be replaced by opponent with any Light Side Lobot. While present on Cloud City with your Lando, prevents replacement of Lobot and Lando.',
